title: InsIIITS - 5 : Returning Students and Fresh Faces
author: InsIIITS
description: With summer adventures behind us, we’re back and ready for a new semester! A big welcome to our Batch '28 freshers—let’s make this year unforgettable!

title: InsIIITS - 4 : Abhisarga Conquered, Summer countdown begins
author: InsIIITS
description: From fest celebrations to exam preparations, and soon the sweet escape of summer vacation—this edition marks the end of an exciting chapter and the beginning of a relaxing one!

title: InsIIITS - 3 : Fresh Start & Festive Vibes
author: InsIIITS
description: Fresh notebooks, new classes, and an amazing fest on the horizon—this semester is about to get exciting. Keep an eye out for what’s coming!

title: InsIIITS - 2 : The Mid Semester Madness
author: InsIIITS
description: From fests to sessions to projects to deadlines, everyone's in full swing and the energy is peaking. Check out the hustle and drive of the semester's busiest period!

title: InsIIITS - 1 : The First Glimpse
author: InsIIITS
description: Unveiling our first ever edition! Bringing you New stories, Fresh insights, and Exciting updates.
